question:
Consider the following pairs of enterprises with their investment limits:
  1. Micro Enterprise in manufacturing sector - does not exceed twenty five lakh rupees
  2. Micro Enterprise in service sector - does not exceed ten lakh rupees
  3. Medium Enterprise in service sector - more than two crore rupees but does not exceed five core rupees
  4. Medium Enterprise in manufacturing sector - more than five crore rupees but does not exceed ten crore rupees
   Which of the above are correct?
explanation: All given pairs are correctMicro Enterprise in manufacturing sector -  does not exceed twenty five lakh rupeesMicro Enterprise in service sector -  does not exceed ten lakh rupeesMedium Enterprise in service sector -  more than two crore rupees but does not exceed five core rupeesMedium Enterprise in manufacturing sector -  more than five crore rupees but does not exceed ten crore rupees
